Package game.actors.enemies.koopas

Class GeneralKoopa

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
game.actors.enemies.Enemy
game.actors.enemies.koopas.GeneralKoopa
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.capabilities.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Printable, Resettable, Speakable
Direct Known Subclasses:
FlyingKoopa, Koopa
public abstract class GeneralKoopa
extends Enemy
GeneralKoopa class is an abstract class represents all Koopa' base of this game. It is a class that extends from the Enemy class. GeneralKoopa will move around in the game map if no player is beside it but it cannot enter floor. Once GeneralKoopa is engaged in a fight (the Player attacks the enemy or the enemy attacks player -- when the player stands in the enemy's surroundings), it will follow the Player. When defeated(is not conscious), it will not be removed from the map. Instead, it will go to a dormant state (D) and stay on the ground (cannot attack nor move), all the behaviors will removed from GeneralKoopa(attack/follow/wander), its character will change from â€™Kâ€™ to â€˜Dâ€™. Mario needs a Wrench (80% hit rate and 50 damage), the only weapon to destroy Koopa's shell. Destroying its shell will drop a Super Mushroom. Different type of Koopa starts with different hit points. Besides, GeneralKoopa also speak every even turn automatically.

      public GeneralKoopa​(java.lang.String name, char displayChar, int hitPoints, int monologueIndexLowerBound, int monologueIndexUpperBound)
      Constructor. The monologue belongs to GeneralKoopa will be print by using index.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the Actor
      displayChar - the character that will represent the Actor in the display
      hitPoints - the Actor's starting hit point
      monologueIndexLowerBound - the upper bound of monologue index
      monologueIndexUpperBound - the lower bound of monologue index

  • Method Details

    • allowableActions

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.ActionList allowableActions​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor otherActor, java.lang.String direction, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.GameMap map)
      Make GeneralKoopa can be attacked by Player. When GeneralKoopa is not conscious(defeated), it will hide in shell and only the actor with capability HOSTILE_TO_ENEMY and HAVE_WRENCH is allowed to smash its shell in order to get a super mushroom.
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class Enemy
      Parameters:
      otherActor - the Actor that might perform an action.
      direction - String representing the direction of the other Actor
      map - current GameMap
      Returns:
      list of actions
      See Also:
      Status.HOSTILE_TO_ENEMY

    • playTurn

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.Action playTurn​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.ActionList actions, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.Action lastAction, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.GameMap map, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Display display)
      Select and return an action to perform on the current turn. If GeneralKoopa is not conscious anymore, it is defeated. At this time, it will turn into shell states and all the behaviors will be removed.
      Overrides:
      playTurn in class Enemy
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      the Action to be performed
